arithmetic.title: Arithmetic Sprint
arithmetic.description: Solve as many equations as you can before the timer ends.

memory.title: Memory Digits
memory.description: Memorise the number and retype it once it disappears.

reaction.title: Reaction Time
reaction.description: Wait for the spark and tap as quickly as you can.

oddOneOut.title: Odd One Out
oddOneOut.description: Pick the item that doesn’t follow the rule.
